description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Sonaar Music MP3 Audio Player for Music, Radio & Podcast by Sonaar allows Stored XSS.This issue affects MP3 Audio Player for Music, Radio & Podcast by Sonaar: from n/a through 5.1.
